entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Teslin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:09 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Teslin Airport 10:52 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow this afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
